description: Now that we have mana, we've got to put it somewhere.
Once you've got mana pouring through the /b/Mana Spreader/b/, you'll need a destination.
/b/Mana Pools/b/ store /b/Mana/b/ for later use, either by /6/dropping items/6/ in the pool or by /b/Functional Flora/b/.
/6/Bind/6/ the /b/Mana Spreader/b/ to the /b/Mana Pool/b/, and make sure there is a /c/clear path/c/ for the /b/Mana Blast/b/ to travel.
Don't worry, even the /b/Diluted Mana Pool/b/ can hold a lot of mana.
